subject: Re:After a long absense.
author: William Murphy
full_text:
--0-1451709442-1166752414=:20917
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hey Frank, glad you're back! I'm very interested in your project, and look forward to your updates. I was in the Denver area last month. The Stanley Hotel in Estes Park was the site of a conference hosted by DarknessRadio.com Had I known you were in the area, I would have tried to contact you. Keep in touch and Happy Holidays - Bill Murphy
--0-1451709442-1166752414=:20917
